column4: do i have to do anything more then apt-get install gtk-dev to get it to work? i just get file not found file not found
I'm trying to comprehend your pastebin, sounds like a mis-configuration, what is the output of "pkg-config --cflags --libs gtk+-2.0" ?
I'm searching for that weird flags
try to compile a small/blank C++ source with verbose enabled
that wasn't the problem of gtk lib
put the "-v" option in your compile command
it should expand all the compile options
these errors just disappear, did you verify that the source file is correct ?. The tutorials might be built for older gcc versions, which won't be compatible with gcc4.1
